pages.text: Steel Swords are the preferred weapon of a Witcher when fighting $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_non_humans)humans and non-humans$(). The sharp blade paired with your precise swings against non-human-type enemies, allows you to harvest $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophies$() from them if holding the appropriate $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract.$()
Turn the page to learn more...

The standard Witcher's steel sword. Will allow you to harvest a $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophy$() from any $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_non_humans)non-human-type enemies$(), provided you have their $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract$() in your inventory. You will also deal additional damage to non-human-type enemies if you are holding $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_blade_oil)[Blade Oil]$() in your offhand.

pages.title: Recipe (shaped)
pages.text: Ingredients: Iron Ingot x2, Leather x2, and Stick x1.

An upgrade to the steel sword, dealing more base attack damage. Will allow you to harvest a $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophy$() from any $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_non_humans)non-human-type enemies$(), provided you have their $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract$() in your inventory. You will also deal additional damage to non-human-type enemies if you are holding $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_blade_oil)[Blade Oil]$() in your offhand.

pages.title: Recipe (shaped)
pages.text: Ingredients: $(l:weapons_armour/steel_sword_entry#page_steel_sword)Steel Sword$() x1, $(l:crafting/enriched_dimeritium_ingot#page_enriched_dimeritium)Enriched Dimeritium Ingot$() x6, and Leather x2.

The final upgrade to the steel sword, dealing more base attack damage than its two predecessors. Can be upgraded into a steel $(l:weapons_armour/relic_weapons_entry#page_relic_weapons)relic weapon$() at a smithing table. Will allow you to harvest a $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophy$() from any $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_non_humans)non-human-type enemies$(), provided you have their $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract$() in your inventory. You will also deal additional damage to non-human-type enemies if you are holding $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_blade_oil)[Blade Oil]$() in your offhand.

pages.title: Recipe (smithing)
pages.text: Combine an $(l:weapons_armour/steel_sword_entry#page_enhanced_steel_sword)Enhanced Steel Sword$() with a Netherite Ingot in a smithing table.
